Emporio Armani Diamonds Eau de Parfum - 100 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.4420

Polished and enigmatic this luxury scent gently entangles sweet and fragrant extracts that harmoniously merge into a sensuous aroma. Emporio Armani Diamonds is specially concocted for the well-bred woman whose grace and poise enchants her admirers and is the envy of young women. Created by Thierry Wasser for the esteemed house of Armani this evocative Eau de Parfum sets a bewitching charm on you.

The fruity top note infuses tangy and woody hints of raspberry and delicate notes of litchi. Following this is a spontaneous mix of floral notes of freesia earthy patchouli warming cedar sweet hints of rose and floral green notes of lily of the valley. This fragrance dries down with a Â deep-scented base note of creamy vanilla heavy hints of vetiver and smoky amber. The pure and fruity accords that liven this fresh oriental fragrance envelope you in a refreshing calm any time you choose to wear it. Spotlessly clear Armani Diamonds floats like a precious elixir within a sparkling oval-shaped glass flacon that looks like a polished bauble. An enforcing silver stopper glistening at the crown adds the finishing stroke on this exquisitely sculpted structure. Untainted sublime and simply extravagant - Diamonds are truly a girl's best friend.

column17:
Emporio Armani Elle Eau de Parfum - 100 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.4110

A luxury scent that exudes an enchanting aroma for the graceful woman who is subtle yet loves to make her presence felt. A spritz of Emporio Armani Elle and the captivating woman transcends to a different plane altogether. This Eau de Parfum is the creation of Sophie Labbe for the resplendent house of Armani.

A refreshing top note is redolent with fruity pineapple citrus hints of orange bittersweet lime fragrant tuberose sweet bergamot and light hints of pear. The heart note brings together woody essence of orris root exotic jasmine floral notes of lily of the valley and distinct hints of heliotrope. Finally the base note wraps up rich hints of sandalwood smoky amber heavy and soothing musk warming cedar creamy vanilla and lovely tonka bean. An oriental fragrance filled with floral and woody accords radiates a sensuous aura any time you choose to wear it. True to the minimalist and classy style of Armani Elle flaunts a simple yet sleek design. A slender cylindrical flacon painted a sophisticated ivory shade rests elegantly on your dresser. An intoxicating scent within an alluring flacon - Emporio Armani Elle is made to impress.
